details:
verb
- to remove the ovaries of
= example: to remove the ovaries of
= synonyms: neuter
- to become different in some particular way, without permanently losing one's or its former characteristics or essence
= example: to become different in some particular way, without permanently losing one's or its former characteristics or essence
= synonyms: change
- to cause to change
= example: to cause to change
= synonyms: change
- to insert words into texts, often falsifying it thereby
= example: to insert words into texts, often falsifying it thereby
= synonyms: interpolate, falsify
- to make an alteration to
= example: to make an alteration to
